list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the mass of eggs contained in the ovaries of a female fish or shellfish, typically including the ovaries themselves, especially when ripe and used as food.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: lumpfish roe is most like caviar
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ROE SLUMFISH giống như trứng cá muối nhất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small Eurasian deer which lacks a visible tail and has a reddish summer coat that turns grayish in winter.
